tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
quoteText:
Bitly may amend this Privacy Policy from time to time.
If we make material changes in the way we collect or use information, we will notify you by posting an announcement on the Services or sending you an email, and we will indicate when those changes will become effective.
